name: Cisco | IOS | Network | STP | Root Changed (SYSLOG)
description: %SPANTREE-5-ROOTCHANGE: Root Changed for instance 1: New Root Port is GigabitEthernet0/48. New Root Mac Address is 0000.0032.0087

patterns.value_re: %SPANTREE-5-ROOTCHANGE: Root Changed for instance (?P<instance>\d+): New Root Port is (?P<interface>\S+)\. New Root Mac Address is \S+
